title: "Carrefour Dubai cuts transaction times by 75% with face biometrics"
excerpt: "The average transaction time for customers opting to pay for their purchases at Carrefour stores in Dubai with a biometric payment system using face recognition technology is 75% less than for other point-of-sale (POS) payment systems, the retailer says."
